text: "Slow Down" is a 1958 song by Larry Williams and was only released along with Dizzy, Miss Lizzy. Both songs were covered by The Beatles. == The Beatles rendition== In 1964, The Beatles released a cover version of Slow Down as a B-side to their single Matchbox. It went to number 25 in the United States. Category:The Beatles songs Category:1958 songs
title: Slow Down (Larry Williams song)
